sentence: The numbers reflect the high-stakes nature of the Senate race between Warnock and his likely Republican opponent, former University of Georgia football star Herschel Walker.
author: Cami Mondeaux
title: Sen. Warnock has over $25 million in the bank for fight against GOP rival Walker

sentence: That bank account is anticipated to be a key advantage in his bid this year for a full term against likely GOP nominee Herschel Walker, the former NFL star.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Warnock raises $13.6 million in first quarter of 2022

sentence: Former football star Herschel Walker, the GOP frontrunner, ended 2021 with roughly $5 million in the bank.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Warnock sets another fundraising record, ends quarter with $25.6M in the bank

sentence: The Republican frontrunner, Herschel Walker, took in more than $5 million, outpacing his other Republican primary opponents, but at the same time that Warnock took in roughly $13 million.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Majority of Democrat Sen. Raphael Warnocks Campaign Donations Are from Out of State

sentence: He has outraised his GOP opponent, Herschel Walker, by almost double in the last quarter of 2021, with donations averaging at $43.
author: Rebekah Sager
title: Warnock soaring to the lead in fundraising over GOP opponent, Trump lapdog Herschel Walker
